title: ÂµTorrentPlus 3.4.2.33394 Multilingual Portable(Bernat)
description:
Extract rar archive in "C:Users(your_username)Documents"

To start the application, double-click "uTorrentPortable.exe" in : "C:Users(your_username)DocumentsuTorrentPortableuTorrentPortable.exe".

You can create a shortcut on your desktop or elsewhere ...

To change the language of the software : Options/Preferences/Language

Although the splash screen does not delay the launch, you can disable it with :
"DisableSplashScreen=true" in "C:Users(your username)DocumentsuTorrentPortablePortable.ini"

It is not possible to make updates directly via "help / check for updates".
Even if updates are available you will have the message "there is no new version available at this time".

Don't forget to close in systray when leaving.
